lines.text: Goofy Movies. A whole show in one reel.
Wotaphony Newsreel. Sees nothing! Hears nothing! Knows nothing!
And so, aside from the fact that the ship sank, the launching ceremonies were a complete success.

A Revolver, A High Cliff and You. Our drama today is a prehistoric movie of the year 1909 and presents an epic of base Scandinavian emotions. This movie was recently discovered in the beard of a Swedish producer, where it had been buried for years.
Hi-ho! No one else would shoot Jake, so he had to shoot himself.
And now, as the curtain falls, we line up our actors and give them a suitable reward.
